com.dhemery.core.Feature

Packages that use Feature
com.dhemery.core Construct and evaluate objects.

Uses of Feature in com.dhemery.core
 

Classes in com.dhemery.core that implement Feature
 class NamedFeature<T,V>
          A feature that describes itself with a fixed name.
 class PresentFeature
          A feature that determines whether a MaybePresent subject is present.
 class VisibleFeature
          A feature that determines whether the MaybeVisible subject is visible.
 

Constructors in com.dhemery.core with parameters of type Feature
FeatureSampler(S subject, Feature<? super S,V> feature)
          Create a sampler that samples the feature of the subject.
